text: Attack and Retreat () is a 1964 Soviet-Italian war drama movie directed by Giuseppe De Santis and Dmitri Vasilyev.Неореализм, оттепель и «Очи черные». Кинороман между Россией и ИталиейОНИ ШЛИ НА ВОСТОК (1964) It stars Arthur Kennedy, Peter Falk, and Zhanna Prokhorenko. ==Actors== *Arthur Kennedy as Ferro Maria Ferri *Peter Falk as Lieutenant Mario Salvioni *Zhanna Prokhorenko as Katya *Raffaele Pisu as Libero Gabrielli *Tatyana Samojlova as Sonya *Andrea Checchi as Colonel Sermonti == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:1964 war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Giuseppe De Santis Category:Movies directed by Dmitri Vasilyev
title: Attack and Retreat
